item.title: Implicit bias impacts how autistic and non-autistic people exert 'charitable' effort

item.title: Cyberdelics: Immersive VR visual hallucinations simulate effects of psychedelic substances
item.description: Immersive virtual reality experiences can reproduce visual hallucination effects, miming those induced by the use of psychedelic substances.
